item.description:
Feeling a little Broadway? Well, not quite Broadway, but have we got a treat for you!

 

First, dinner at Effie's Place Family Restaurant located at 91 Park Rd West, Hartford,Ct....quality food and service with affordable prices. They specialize in home cooked meals such as meatloaf, lasagna, and spagetti and meatballs .Also a wide range of burgers and sandwiches. On a personal note, Chuck had breakfast there...very good food and they do treat you like "family".

 

The play....You're A Good Man Charlie Brown. Based on the comic strip "Peanuts" by Charles Schulz, invites the kid in all of us into the world of Charlie Brown, his dog Snoopy, and the rest of the Peanuts gang for a fast-paced, lighthearted musical guaranteed to please audiences of all ages. This 1999 revised version won 2 Tony awards.

 

Tickets for the play are $29.00 which (includes $1.50 service charge ). Checks should be made out to Chuck Quint and received  no later than june 11. Please send to Chuck Quint, 125 Ford Road, Windsor, CT 06095. Dinner is at 5pm and play starts at 8pm.

 

Come on out and join us and let's have some fun!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: You're A Good Man, Charlie Brown! A Play and Dinner...
